record.id: name="New Mobile Employee Bundle" and syslanguage="en"
record.name: New Mobile Employee Bundle
record.description: Setup up a new remote employee working from home with mobile equipment and remote access accounts. This includes a fully provisioned Laptop Bundle, network access, and accounts to primary communication and security services.
record.detailedDescription: Setup up a new remote employee working from home with mobile equipment and remote access accounts. This includes a fully provisioned Laptop Bundle, network access, and accounts to primary communication and security services.
record.options: <form><label id="opt1">(1) Standard Laptop Bundle</label><label id="opt2">(1) PC Backup</label><label id="opt3">(1) Employee Mailbox</label><label id="opt4">(1) Business Call from Home</label><label id="opt5">(1) Employee Remote Access</label></form>
record.optionsAlias: <form><label id="opt1">(1) Standard Laptop Bundle</label><label id="opt2">(1) PC Backup</label><label id="opt3">(1) Employee Mailbox</label><label id="opt4">(1) Business Call from Home</label><label id="opt5">(1) Employee Remote Access</label></form>
